Body:
with self.app.test_client() as c:
    rv = c.get('/v1/prose')
    prose = json.loads(rv.get_json())
    print('@@@', type(prose), prose)
    self.assertEqual(rv.status_code, 200)
    self.assertIsInstance(rv, JsonResponse)
    rv = c.get('/v1/prose/' + prose['id'])
    self.assertEqual(rv.status_code, 200)
    self.assertIsInstance(rv, JsonResponse)
